tax_brackets.source: Gemini Web Search, 2025-08-10, 'New Zealand income tax rates 1959'
tax_brackets.notes: NEEDS RESEARCH. The full bracket structure is unknown. The values here are approximations based on search results indicating that the 1954 tax scale was still in effect. This scale had a 15% starting rate and a 76.5% top rate. The threshold is an assumption.

ietc.notes: Policy did not exist in this year (starts 2009).

wff.notes: Policy did not exist in this year (starts 2005).

ppl.notes: Policy did not exist in this year (starts 2002).

child_support.notes: Policy did not exist in this year (starts 1991).

acc_levy.source: Gemini Web Search, 2025-08-10, 'New Zealand income tax rates 1959'
acc_levy.notes: ACC scheme did not exist in this year.
